cantaloupe.loaders module¶

cantaloupe.loaders.load_workflow_context(workflows: Path) → dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

loads the context file from a given directory.

Parameters:

workflows (Path) – directory containing the workflows

Returns:

context file as a dictionary

Return type:

dict[str, Any] | None

cantaloupe.loaders.load_workflows(workflows: Path) → Iterable[Workflow][source]¶

loads all workflows from a given directory.

Parameters:

workflows – Path containing workflows

Returns:

iterable of workflows

Note: Workflow files must be named workflow_*.yaml
